marketplaces.name: kenji-claude-code
marketplaces.description: Kenji's curated Claude Code setup for productive development

files.README.md:
# Kenji's Claude Code Setup

My personal Claude Code configuration for productive web development.

## Quick Install

```bash
# Step 1: Add the marketplace
/plugin marketplace add edmund-io/kenji-claude-code

# Step 2: Install the plugin
/plugin install kenji-claude-code
```
